channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A confrontation between motorists in Toronto turns into a group rumble in the street; in Texas, an ex-convict risks his life to save a wounded officer during a freeway shootout; a bus driver working the early morning shift causes a six-car pileup in Colorado; in Cleveland, a tow truck flips a disabled vehicle into oncoming highway traffic with the driver still inside.
